citations.desc: CLEANING, SANITIZATION, HOUSEKEEPING, AND PEST CONTROL.
citations.narrative:
General Requirements. The large exercise pen in the yard currently housing the 5 puppies constructed of wire
panels. The surfaces of the panels have become rusty which will inhibit proper cleaning and sanitization . Improper
sanitization can allow the growth of bacteria, fungus , etc. which may be harmful to the puppies. The panels shall
be repaired or replaced to protect the health of the puppies. Correct by June 18, 2015 .
Exit interview conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.11(a)(1)(9)
CLEANING, SANITIZATION, HOUSEKEEPING, AND PEST CONTROL.
General Requirements.  The large exercise pen in the yard currently housing the 5 puppies constructed of wire
panels. The surfaces of the panels have become rusty which will inhibit proper cleaning and sanitization .  Improper
sanitization can allow the growth of bacteria, fungus , etc.  which may be harmful to the puppies.  The panels shall
be repaired or replaced to protect the health of the puppies.  Correct by June 18, 2015 .
Exit interview conducted with the owner.
